tidbits.title: First Independent Nation
tidbits.description: Haiti became the first independent nation in Latin America and the Caribbean, achieving freedom from colonial rule through a successful slave revolution.

tidbits.title: Vibrant Culture
tidbits.description: The country boasts a vibrant culture, expressed through art, music (such as compas and rara), dance, vibrant Vodou traditions, and rich cuisine.

tidbits.title: Challenging History
tidbits.description: Haiti has faced numerous challenges, including political turmoil, natural disasters, and economic difficulties, yet the resilience of its people remains strong.
